doc: Add a script to the queue and configure it.

fields.doc: Is this a standard script (True) or an external script (False)?
fields.name: isStandard

fields.doc: Path to script, relative to the root directory for standard or external scripts.
fields.name: path

fields.doc: Configuration as yaml text that is parsed to make a keyword argument dict for the script's configure method.
fields.name: config

fields.doc: Short description of why you are running this script.
fields.name: descr

fields.doc: Index of Script SAL component referred to by `location`; ignored unless `location` is `Before` or `After`.
fields.name: locationSalIndex

name: ScriptQueue_command_add
